html: (2 Nephi 23:13)."The earth shall remove out of her place." While it is true that Isaiah's seeric eyes could have seen the many earthquakes which will rock this planet in the last days, including the great one to occur at the time of the Second Coming, there may be a more significant explanation for what this Old Testament seer saw. One of the basic beliefs of Latter-day Saints is: "We believe … that the earth will be renewed and receive its paradisiacal glory." (A of F 1:10.) Before the fall of Adam and Eve, this earth was a terrestrial sphere in a Garden-of-Eden state of existence. This same condition will return and prevail throughout the thousand-year period of time known as the Millennium. This will include "bringing the mass of the earth back to the conditionit was in before the continents and islands were separated, when the earth was 'divided.'" (See BICQ, 216-18.)
